website_summaries.verdict: Comfortable and hassle-free wear is the essence of SeaVees sneakers, the SeaVees Hawthorne Slip On included. Its design and support details make it one of the top choices for many wearers as it can be used for holidays, special occasions, or simply for everyday activities. As versatile as any lifestyle kicks could be, this low-top blends seamlessly with casual dresses. If one is looking for a dependable go-to shoe, the SeaVees Hawthorne Slip On ticks all the boxes.
pros: Most of the wearers of this low-top have praised its modest design
Because of its qualities, many buyers make it their everyday footwear
A number of purchasers mention that they got compliments while wearing the SeaVees Hawthorne Slip On
One purchaser has shared that she had no complaints about the shoe when she used the shoe all the time during a vacation trip
Because of its comfort and lightweight feel, some of the customers suggest that this SeaVees shoe is a great choice for a summer or spring sneaker
According to a couple of shoppers, there is no break-in period needed
A few of the commenters have advised that they bought more than a pair because of their general satisfaction with the shoe
cons: Some reviews have implied that there should be more color options
Durability is not among its highlights, as per a couple of customers

customer_reviews.title: Good with a weakness.
customer_reviews.text: Solid shoe except for a weakness off the balls of the feet. My feet are wide but not huge. Both of my pairs split in the same space. Could be a bit to do with my feet but still a let down.
customer_reviews.author: Manunyc

customer_reviews.title: Best treat for your feet
customer_reviews.text: Reading most reviews can be troubling. Many consumers have diverse preference of fit. That being said, some prefer shoes a little lose and some snug. I prefer enough space for mid weight socks. So, I prefer true fit. So if you have true medium feet, these shoes are true fit, comfortable and gentle on the feet. They hug your feet comfortably, and worth every penny. I love these and buying more colours.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy Them. Light washing will ruin.
customer_reviews.text: Shoes look good and fit well. Got one shoe a tiny bit dirty. Washed it and brown stuff leached through and ruined the material. Call Seavees and they said they shouldn’t be washed. Supposedly it’s weitten somewhere just not where anyone would actually read it. Couldn’t offer a replacement. That’s fine but I’ll never buy from them again, even if they were 90% off. Really disappointed. Wore them 1 time.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Rouse

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but fits very wide
customer_reviews.text: If you dont have wide feet, these pretty much won't work for you. I normally wear a size 10.5 in most shoes. These were the right width at that size, but very short. I tried an 11 as well, but they were still too short and way too wide at this point. Not going to bother trying an 11.5, even if they are long enough the width will be sloppy.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Just outside 30 day return period, already showing signs that they won't last long
customer_reviews.text: I've had a pair before (black) that were just fine for very occasional, light wear. But this latest pair, which I've worn a couple dozen times or so for walks around the city during the just over 30 days I've owned them, are already showing signs of failure. Rubber shouldn't crack that soon and there are other signs of problems with the shoes. Enjoy the fashion and comfort while they last - which seems like that won't be a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tight
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is tight & a little hard to get on. If I wear an ankle sock, it’s extremely hard to get on. The shoes can get a little uncomfortable if walking for any distance. This is particularly true behind the top part of the ankle. I’m hoping that it will be more comfortable as they break in.
customer_reviews.author: Paul G. McCallum

customer_reviews.title: Vans in 13 are great. But these are like a 12 in any ...
customer_reviews.text: These are not normal 13 shoes. These are 13 -N. -N for insanely narrow. Now I'll grant you, I got a wide foot, but not in a lot of shoes. Vans in 13 are great. But these are like a 12 in any normal width. I felt like when the Hulk rips through his clothes and shoes, trying to put them on. They look nice. Just like the fancy picture.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: good looks, classic styling and comfort comfort
customer_reviews.text: been a fan of plimsoles as far back as I can remember and these Seevees hit the bull's eye regarding the classic styling I am looking for combined with comfort and good looks in a quality product
customer_reviews.author: Craig B. Suide

customer_reviews.title: SeaVees are the only sneakers to wear! Get em!
customer_reviews.text: When it comes to every day wear sneakers SeaVees are the best. Great quality, super comfort, no slip sole and uber style. As a chef, I bought these to wear outside of the kitchen at some summer events.
customer_reviews.author: D & Chef G

customer_reviews.title: All around better fit than others of its type and worth the money spent
customer_reviews.text: I wanted durable knockabouts shoes with flat, grippy soles and at least a little arch support, so no Converse and my others shoes of the type quickly split where they bend. I have flat feet and these SeaVees (black Hawthorne) seem fine so far - and I wear them a lot. The insoles come out, which is great because sometimes I want to insert my own insoles when the feet are acting up.
customer_reviews.author: Charles A. Fallang

customer_reviews.title: Lovvvve them!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this sneaker. The materials used, including the comfortable yet removable insoles are top notch. Imo, the total look & style of these sneakers are exactly what I’ve been looking for. These are actually my second pair, the first pair are a army fatigue style and I plan on getting more varieties.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Starr

customer_reviews.title: Fit and Look GREAT!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these slip on, I like that they are less round at the toe than Vans, SeaVess are my new go to! I have 3 pair!!!
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable Casual Sneaker
customer_reviews.text: I was more than delighted to try on my new white Seavees slip-on casual sneaker. It fit perfectly, looks great and I can't wait to order more sneakers in different colors. Totally recommend this sneaker!
customer_reviews.author: Yvette Madison

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended for people with wide feet
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of these shoes, but even though I ordered up a size (bought a size 10 instead of reg. 9.5) because SeaVees recommended it for wider feet, these shoes were clearly too small for me, both in width and length.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes and comfortable. They seem to dirty up quick though and the white lower is darkened quick.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy Vans, Tried these for a change and was very pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur L

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart
customer_reviews.text: Sole is already coming apart from the shoe. I have had SeaVees is the past and seemed indestructible but after a month these are falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was glad I got these.
customer_reviews.text: These are stylish little slip ons. I wear them with shorts and jeans. It's all good.
customer_reviews.author: Not my real name

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Quality seems good a couple weeks in. I wear a wide shoe so I ordered a half size larger.
customer_reviews.author: D a v i d

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are really comfortable, well made, and look great!! Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Lage

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I get lots of compliments on these new shoes! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice summer shoes
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes just not my style needed a higher arch but these are worth buying
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too small!
customer_reviews.text: Too small. I normally wear 9 1/2 but ordered 10 to be safe. Still too small.
customer_reviews.author: M S GREENE

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love my SeaVees, I own 8 pairs now and they're all great!
customer_reviews.author: Bouncer Criss

customer_reviews.title: nice sneakers. second pair I buy for myself
customer_reviews.text: as expected. no problems. nice sneakers. second pair I buy for myself.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Strange phenomenon
customer_reviews.text: I previously purchased the same pair but in suede, size 11. They were awesome, to my dismay, I came home one day to see that my bullterrier had eaten one. The size 11 was slightly too big by length, so I thought on the replacement I would buy a size 10.5. By length the shoes fit well but are extremely tight across the top. Thinking and now hoping they will stretch, if not since I wore them, this will be sunk cost.
customer_reviews.author: XXX

customer_reviews.title: hate them too wide and too large dont look the same as picture
customer_reviews.text: they are so wide you can use them as a boat. cant even walk with them,
customer_reviews.author: natty

product_meta.title: Seavees Men's Hawthorne Slip on Fashion Sneaker
product_meta.description: Born in 1964, SeaVees is the original way to go casual. With a groundbreaking advertising campaign throughout the 1960s, SeaVees pioneered the transformation of the sneaker from gym shoe to casual shoe. For any social affair, one could show up in SeaVees a comfortable sneaker with the sophistication of a dressier shoe. Today, SeaVees honors its origin by adding modern amendments to retro-inspired styling, setting a new standard for timeless footwear design. Show up in SeaVees. The original way to go casual. The hawthorne slip on is our modern take on the tried-and-true twin gore classic. With higher sidewalls and no binding, the hawthorne is our more substantial slip-on choice.
feature_bullets: Uppers of superior cotton poplin and sueded leather backstay
Memory foam footbed with cooling air channels
Natural gum rubber outsole for flexibility, longer wear and softer step
Herringbone sole design for maximum surface grip
